description: Person, Dragonborn, Brother of Balasar, Healer/Caster. Motivation: To heal and protect his brother Balasar; to bring life, order, and peace; to defeat the uncivilized orcs whose Gods seek subjugation.
Deity/God, Dragon Goddess of life, mercy, and healing (The Great Mother). Motivation: To grant mercy and strength to her champion (Balasar) and her followers (Shedinn).

Person, Dragonborn, Brother of Shedinn, Chieftain/King, Warrior. Motivation: To avenge the injury inflicted by the orc warchief; to defeat the orc horde and their leader; to protect his lands and people from the destruction the orcs would wreak.
key_relations: Brother of Shedinn, King of Shesten and Ranhas
history: Injured by Orc Warchief, healed by Shedinn

description: Person (Historical), Great servant of Tamara, Ancestor of Balasar.
Location, Highlands where Balasar is King.
Location, Shore where Balasar is King.
Object/Weapon, Balasar's heavy zweihander (Greatsword), means 'friend'. Motivation: To help Balasar from the beyond (implied by the flaming runes).
key_relations: Owned by Balasar, named after Ssarki

description: Person (Deceased), Balasar's dead friend, Name etched on Javok. Motivation: To help Balasar from the beyond.
history: Died to Yuan-Ti ambush in Aass-Nag jungle

description: Location, Lowlands, origin of the barbarian orcs.
Creature/Group, Barbarian invaders. Motivation: Loot and conquest.
Person, Leader of the Orc horde. Motivation: To defeat Balasar and the dragonborn fighters; to continue the subjugation and conquest sought by his people.
key_relations: Leader of Orcs, Enemy of Balasar
